runs.comm: no turn from outside off stump but the ball is still good enough to beat Levi
Levi pushes the ball into the covers for a single
Amla plays a fluent drive but doesn't beat cover
worked off the pads through midwicket, a fielder had been taken out of that position after the previous ball
Amla aims for the big inside out shot over extra cover but gets beaten, Akmal whips off the bails but Amla's foot never left the ground

dropped, Kamran's let Amla off. Amla tried to whack the ball inside out over the off side once again and edged it, fairly routine chance and Akmal fails to hold on. Amla was well out of his crease, could have been stumped as well
Levi moves forward and drives to mid-off
good length outside off stump, left alone
played towards point for a single
that is a shocker from Shoaib Malik at cover point, Amla just punched the length ball straight to him, Malik failed to get his body behind the ball and let it go through

Malik's made amends by catching Amla! It was the slower ball from Arafat, bowled fullish outside off, Amla was early on the drive and he spooned it towards cover, where Malik stooped forward to take a low catch. Kamran Akmal will be very relieved as well

Pakistan miss a chance to run out Levi. Kallis worked the ball off his pads behind square and ran, Levi responded but was always in trouble. The throw from the fielder missed the stumps at the striker's end, though. Raza Hasan was the fielder
the arm ball and it was a quick one, Kallis had to hurry his defence
this is the offbreak and Kallis gets beaten outside off
driven fluently but straight to the cover fielder
played off the back foot to point
Kallis backs away towards leg and tries to smash the ball inside out over cover, Raza beats him with the offbreak that moves away from the right-hander
Raza's bowled a maiden! Kallis hits the last ball off the back foot to point
length ball outside off stump, Levi has room to cut and he hits the ball hard enough to beat third man
a slower ball on off and middle, Levi waits for it and pushes towards mid-off
that's too wide outside off, Kallis decides to chase it for some reason
Kallis can't find the gap once again, he's driving well, just not placing them. This one is too cover
another slower ball on off stump, Kallis drives from his crease to extra cover
Kallis tries to clear the long-off boundary but doesn't time his loft, the ball hit the toe of the bat. Afridi runs back from mid-off but can't reach the catch, the ball falls safely
another slower ball, which Kallis tries to drive a bit too hard, he hits the ball down the ground. The South African batsman have been going hard at the ball and not timing it well
he's hit this superbly, Kallis makes a bit of room and lofts the ball towards the sightscreen, moved his front foot slightly out of the way and swung hard
tries to work the ball into the leg side but doesn't make contact
makes room and plays towards cover, Raza is bowling flatter and quicker
bowled quick on off and middle from round the wicket, Levi bunts it towards mid-on
Kallis attempts a mighty slog sweep but this ball is slower and Kallis misses
he was aiming midwicket but hit the ball through square leg
Kallis moves a long way across his stumps to try and sweep but misses and is hit on the pad. Ajmal appeals loudly but the umpire says not out. That was mighty close
how ugly is that dismissal! Levi's been bowled through his legs while attempting a reverse sweep. The length was too full to play that shot and he got into no position whatsoever. Looked very clumsy.
Ajmal goes round the wicket and slants the ball into the left-hander, Duminy defends
Duminy goes right back and tries to cut the ball, he hit that from off and middle stump, was very lucky to make contact
Duminy tries to sweep but misses and is hit on the pad
goes deep into his crease and defends on the leg side
caught at cover! Kallis drives hard at the offbreak and hits it straight at Afridi at short cover, Afridi takes the catch at chest height. South Africa in serious trouble
Behardien goes right back and plays tentatively towards the bowler
another awkward front foot push towards Hafeez
driven to long off for a single
Duminy gets down on one knee and laps the ball towards fine leg
Behardien stays back and nudges the ball from middle stump towards square leg
full ball on off stump, Behardien drives off the front foot through cover
Behardien stays in his crease and plays the ball to deep square
Duminy plays a reverse slap from leg stump behind point, if that makes any sense!
played back to the bowler
defended on the back foot to midwicket
played off the back foot towards point
Duminy moves deep into his crease and whips the ball off his pads through square
bowled full and straight, Behardien hits the ball towards wide mid-on
Duminy tries to hit the ball off his pads again but doesn't make proper contact
moves across his stumps to work the ball in front of square leg
comes out of his crease and drives to long off
Behardien moves forward and drives along the ground to long off
moves towards the off side and works the ball behind square
tossed up on middle stump, nudged to midwicket and Behardien takes off for the single, Duminy sends him back but it needed a better throw to run out the batsman
played behind square off the pads
that was the googly and Duminy dabbed it off the back foot towards short third man
Behardien gives South Africa a boundary after ages, glancing the quick delivery off his pads towards the fine leg boundary, Gul dives but fails to stop the ball
played off the pads towards short fine leg
Duminy steps forward and plays the ball through midwicket
Behardien moves back and across to nudge towards square leg. That's all he's looking to do for now, nudge, glance, push, prod
Duminy waits very late and nearly cuts the ball out of the keeper's gloves towards third man
driven off the back foot towards long on
Behardien goes right back in front of the stumps - I can't see any of them - and defends on the leg side
Duminy moves back and across to work the ball through midwicket
Behardien moves back and across and dabs towards short fine leg
Duminy collects another single by pushing towards mid-on
width outside off stump and Behardien plays his first forceful shot, cutting off the back foot through point and finding the boundary

Behardien may be run out! He pushed the ball straight to short cover and set off for a run that did not exist, Duminy sent him back. Behardien got back just in time, before the direct hit dislodged bails
he moves back and defends awkwardly on the off side
Duminy gives the bowler the charge, gets to the pitch of the ball, and tees off, carting the ball over long on for the day's first six
driven to long off for a single

stumped! Behardien gave Hafeez the charge but made his move too early, Hafeez fired the ball quick and across the right-hander from round the wicket. Behardien swung hard but failed to connect, Kamran collected cleanly and took off the bails
his first shot is a reverse swat, hitting the ball through point
tossed up on off stump, Duminy squeezes it towards short third man, de Villiers would have been a goner had there been a direct hit but the throw was poor
AB whips the ball off his pads through square and runs a risky second ...
Duminy misses the reverse sweep and Afridi appeals for lbw, that hit the pad outside off stump
bowled slower through the air outside off stump, driven on the front foot through cover
Duminy stays still this time and drives to long on
AB bottom edges the cut to short third man and Duminy sprints through
a late, soft dab towards short third man where Gul dives to prevent the ball from going past him
played on the off side
worked off the pads towards deep square leg
AB waits a bit too late to work the ball through square and fails to make proper contact
he backs away to cut and cuts very late, hitting the ball from middle stump towards deep point
the quicker ball on middle and off, Duminy waits in his crease and plays through midwicket
punched off the back foot towards deep point once again
that's a poor ball, a rare one today, short and wide, Duminy waits and uses the width to cut hard through point
AB backs away to sweep but Afridi follows him with a quick ball and hits the pad
AB steps out of his crease and lofts the ball straight over Afridi's head, didn;t try and smash it, just chipped and timed it really well
hit back towards Afridi, who deflects the ball with his right hand towards the leg side
Duminy backs away but Afridi follows him, he goes too far down leg side though
cut off the back foot through point and the batsman race through for two
Duminy waits for the leg break and dabs it behind point
a quick ball dragged short, AB cuts towards deep point, Duminy wanted the second but AB said no
AB backs away to cut but is beaten outside off
AB waits on a delivery that is a touch short and lofts the ball over cover and into the gap on the boundary, he hit that off the back foot
a reverse swat through point for a single
Duminy jumps into position for the reverse pull and manages to hit it over Afridi at short third man and to the boundary
bowled wide outside off, Duminy reaches for it and drives towards deep cover
in the blockhole on middle stump, AB hits the ball towards long on
AB takes leg-stump guard and Gul tries to cramp him for room with a full ball, AB clears his front leg and lofts the ball over the cow corner boundary

AB's been caught at sweeper! It was a full toss from Gul and AB backed away outside leg and swung hard, he ended up slicing the ball in the air and Imran Nazir came forward from the boundary and took the catch
another full toss outside off stump, Duminy tries to run it to third man but is beaten
too full outside off, Duminy moves forward and plays the square drive past point
Duminy reaches out for a wide one and hits towards cover
short of a length outside off, Morkel stays back and hits the ball through cover
short of a length and Morkel pulls in front of square
stunning strike! Duminy moves forward and across his stumps and golf swings the ball over wide long-on, he didn't even look at the ball, had his head down and swung hard
moves across his stumps once again and swings the ball towards long leg, Gul can't prevent the second
caught behind! Duminy swings across the line to a full ball slanting across him outside off stump, he gets a faint edge through to Kamran Akmal
pushed towards mid-off, the length was good and the line around off stump
worked off the pads towards square leg
in the blockhole around off stump, Peterson drives towards point
short of a length outside off stump, Morkel throws his bat at it and slashes the ball towards a wide third man, Ajmal runs to his left and fields
a full toss on leg and middle stump, a quick ball, Peterson backs away and hits through cover
full ball on off stump, Morkel lines it up and thumps the drive past mid-off, who is in the circle
the slower ball bowled wide outside off, Morkel has a mighty swing but misses
Morkel swings across the ling and mis-times the shot towards long on, he hares back for the second and makes it
